OUR COMPANY Read More SUNFLOWER OIL Enquire Now Refined Sunflower Oil Sunflower Oil For Sale Linoleic Sunflower Oil Sisal Fiber – Sisal is broadly categorized under three grades and applied in various industries according to the grades. Medium-grade High-grade SISAL FIBER Sisal Ropes For Sale Sisal Yarn Sisal Rope Sisal Fiber Short Fiber Tow 2 Sisal Fiber Grade 3L(3 Long) Sisal Fiber Grade No. 3 Short Sisal Clothe Sisal Mats SSUG Grade Sisal Fibre Tow 1 Grade Sisal Fibre Our Markets Our customers can take advantage of our highly efficient logistics-, sales- and distribution channels, which take the task of establishing new, cost-intensive trading structures off their hands. thought: There are reports and entries on scam-related databases that mention Agro Afrique Commodities in the context of a non-delivery scam. This is a significant red flag and matches several of the characteristics of a scam website, particularly claims of offering products that are not delivered upon payment. With this information, I believe I have enough evidence to conclude that the website in question is likely a scam. The website https://agroafriquecommodities.com/ is likely a scam.

observation.reason: The website is listed in scam-related databases as being involved in a non-delivery scam. There are reports that match the characteristics of a scam website such as unrealistic claims discrepancies in contact information and reports of non-delivery of products after payment.
